name: Nasi Lemak
description: Fragrant rice cooked in coconut milk, served with sambal, egg, peanuts, and anchovies.

name: Chicken Rice
description: Steamed chicken served with fragrant chicken rice, chili sauce, and soy sauce.

name: Kung Pao Chicken Rice
description: A spicy, stir-fried Chinese dish made with cubes of cooked chicken, peanuts, vegetables and chili peppers, and Sichuan peppercorns.

name: Nasi Kerabu
description: Blue-colored rice served with herbs, salted egg, and fried fish.

name: Yangzhou Fried Rice
description: Classic Chinese fried rice with shrimp, ham, eggs, and vegetables.

name: Claypot Chicken Rice
description: Aromatic rice cooked in claypot with Chinese sausage, vegetables and mushrooms.

name: Chicken Rice Bowl
description: Spicy grilled chicken on rice with cabbage, carrot, and avocado.

name: Mee Goreng Mamak
description: Spicy stir-fried yellow noodles with tofu, potato, and vegetables.

name: Char Kuey Teow
description: Flat rice noodles stir-fried with prawns, egg, bean sprouts, and Chinese sausage.

name: Laksa Penang
description: Tangy fish-based noodle soup with thick rice noodles and vegetables.

name: Mee Rebus
description: Yellow noodles served in thick spicy-sweet potato gravy with egg and tofu.

name: Beef Chow Fun
description: Stir-fried flat rice noodles with tender beef, bean sprouts, and scallions.

name: Wonton Noodle
description: Thin egg noodles with pork wontons in clear broth, served with leafy greens.

name: Teh Tarik
description: Famous Malaysian milk tea, pulled for a frothy top.

name: Milo Ais
description: Iced chocolate malt drink, a Malaysian favorite.

name: Coke
description: Classic fizzy cola drink, served chilled.

name: Limau Ais
description: Refreshing iced lime drink, perfect on a hot day.

name: Soy Milk
description: Traditional Chinese soy milk, served hot or cold.

name: Cendol
description: Shaved ice with pandan jelly, red beans, and coconut milk with gula melaka.

name: Tau Fu Fa
description: Silky smooth soybean pudding served with sweet syrup or ginger syrup.

name: Pisang Goreng
description: Deep-fried banana fritters, crispy outside and sweet inside.

name: Mango Pomelo Sago
description: Refreshing dessert with mango, pomelo, sago pearls, and coconut milk.

name: Egg Tart
description: Flaky pastry crust filled with smooth egg custard.

name: Karipap
description: Deep-fried pastry filled with curried potatoes and chicken.

name: Nuggets
description: Crispy golden chicken nuggets, served with dipping sauce.

name: Popcorn Chicken
description: Bite-sized seasoned fried chicken, crunchy and flavorful.

name: Popiah
description: Fresh spring roll with vegetables, egg, and sweet sauce.

name: Char Siu Bao
description: Steamed fluffy buns filled with sweet barbecued pork.
